text: Armando Chávez (born 22 July 1955) is a Mexican rower. He competed in the men's double sculls event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Mexico Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Armando Chávez (rower)
